title: Recording Recomendations

replies.body: Microphone could basically be anything over $15. Regarding the camera, do you mean screen recorder or an actual camera?
replies.body_tagged: Microphone could basically be anything over $15. Regarding the camera, do you mean screen recorder or an actual camera?

replies.body:
^ If you're talking about a screen recorder, I'd recommend OBS
It's free, pretty good quality, no time limit, also can do streaming to twitch, but it does require a little more setup.
